Medal of Honor (Maybe More 3.42+ Required Games) on PS3 Firmware 3.41:

Edit Medal of Honor’s PARAM.SFO so it requires 3.41.
Replace Medal of Honor’s EBOOT.BIN with the one from UFC 2010 (do other games’ EBOOT work?).
Start the game, it should prompt you about an update, install it, then Medal of Honor should boot.
